title: Hezbollah Strikes Israel After Killing Of Its Military Commander
content: Hezbollah forces on Friday resumed rocket and artillery attacks against Israel, ending the lull along the border following Israel's killing of the Lebanese group's military commander in Beirut.
summary: Hezbollah forces on Friday resumed rocket and artillery attacks against Israel, ending the lull along the border following Israel's killing of the Lebanese group's military commander in Beirut.

title: Israel Kills Al Jazeera Journalist, Alleges He Was Hamas Operative
content: The Israeli military confirmed on Thursday it had killed Al Jazeera journalist Ismail Al-Ghoul in an airstrike in Gaza, saying he was a Hamas operative who had taken part in the October 7 attack on Israel, without offering proof for the assertion.
summary: The Israeli military confirmed on Thursday it had killed Al Jazeera journalist Ismail Al-Ghoul in an airstrike in Gaza, saying he was a Hamas operative who had taken part in the October 7 attack on Israel, without offering proof for the assertion.

title: US Sues TikTok Over "Massive-Scale" Privacy Violations Of Kids Under 13
content: The US Justice Department filed a lawsuit Friday against TikTok and parent company ByteDance for failing to protect children's privacy on the social media app.
summary: The US Justice Department filed a lawsuit Friday against TikTok and parent company ByteDance for failing to protect children's privacy on the social media app.

title: It's Official, Kamala Harris Is Democratic Candidate For US Election
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris effectively sealed the Democratic nomination Friday, confirming her remarkable rise to party standard bearer in November's showdown against Republican Donald Trump.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris effectively sealed the Democratic nomination Friday, confirming her remarkable rise to party standard bearer in November's showdown against Republican Donald Trump.

title: Hamas Chief Ismail Haniyeh Buried In Qatar, Thousands Attend Funeral
content: Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh was buried in Qatar on Friday after his killing in Tehran, an attack blamed on Israel that has heightened regional tensions as the Gaza war dragged on.
summary: Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh was buried in Qatar on Friday after his killing in Tehran, an attack blamed on Israel that has heightened regional tensions as the Gaza war dragged on.

title: How Putin Might Gain Or Lose From Prisoner Swap With West
content: When eight Russian citizens including a convicted hitman touched down in Moscow on Thursday in a historic prisoner swap with the West, President Vladimir Putin greeted them like heroes.
summary: When eight Russian citizens including a convicted hitman touched down in Moscow on Thursday in a historic prisoner swap with the West, President Vladimir Putin greeted them like heroes.

title: Biden Administration Convinced Iran Will Attack Israel In Few Days: Report
content: The Biden administration is convinced that Iran will attack Israel in the coming days and is preparing to help it repel it , three American sources told Axios.
summary: The Biden administration is convinced that Iran will attack Israel in the coming days and is preparing to help it repel it , three American sources told Axios.

title: 5 Facts About Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla, Set For Space Mission
content: Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla has been chosen as the prime astronaut for the upcoming Indo-US mission to the International Space Station (ISS). He is the youngest of ISRO's astronaut-designates.
summary: Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla has been chosen as the prime astronaut for the upcoming Indo-US mission to the International Space Station (ISS). He is the youngest of ISRO's astronaut-designates.

title: Opinion: Why The Killing Of Hamas Chief Haniyeh Is Shocking But Not Unexpected
content: Regional tensions are expected to remain significantly high in the days to come as Iran and its proxies decide upon a response.

title: Opinion: Why Do 'Crazy', Childless Cat Ladies Scare Men So Much?
content: People like Vance in India will have to get used to the idea that as women attain greater levels of education and financial independence, many more will choose not to have babies. And we are fast reaching a stage when we don't give a damn.
summary: People like Vance in India will have to get used to the idea that as women attain greater levels of education and financial independence, many more will choose not to have babies. And we are fast reaching a stage when we don't give a damn.

title: Striking U.S. Video Game Actors Say AI Threatens Their Jobs
content: The decision to strike follows months of negotiations with major videogame companies including Activision Productions, Electronic Arts, Epic Games, Take-Two Interactive, Disney Character Voices and Warner Bros Discovery's WB Games.
summary: The decision to strike follows months of negotiations with major videogame companies including Activision Productions, Electronic Arts, Epic Games, Take-Two Interactive, Disney Character Voices and Warner Bros Discovery's WB Games.

title: Who Is Lin Yu-ting? The Olympic Boxer Who Failed Gender Eligibility Test

title: Explained: How Gender Tests Work And Why Algerian Boxer Failed It
content: Algerian boxer Imane Khelif's Olympic bout against Angela Carini ended in just 46 seconds after the Italian fighter withdrew from the match.

title: Turkey Blocks Access To Instagram Without Stating Reason Or Duration
content: Turkey on Friday blocked access to the Instagram social media network, the national communications authority said without explanation, following censorship accusations against the US company by a high-ranking Turkish official.
summary: Turkey on Friday blocked access to the Instagram social media network, the national communications authority said without explanation, following censorship accusations against the US company by a high-ranking Turkish official.

title: Opinion: US-Russia Prisoner Swap: Trump's Promise, Delivered By Biden
content: The biggest prisoner swap since the Cold War with Russia would also help Biden leave office asserting his diplomatic prowess, that he is a man who had the skill to be able to bring together American allies and partners in tough times.
summary: The biggest prisoner swap since the Cold War with Russia would also help Biden leave office asserting his diplomatic prowess, that he is a man who had the skill to be able to bring together American allies and partners in tough times.

title: Israel Did Not Deliberately Kill Foreign Aid Workers In Gaza, Says Australia
content: Israeli air strikes that killed international aid workers in Gaza in April were the result of serious operational failures but were not intentional, according to an Australian government review of the incident released on Friday.
summary: Israeli air strikes that killed international aid workers in Gaza in April were the result of serious operational failures but were not intentional, according to an Australian government review of the incident released on Friday.

title: "Why Are You OK With Man Beating Woman": JK Rowling On Olympics Gender Row
content: Harry Potter creator JK Rowling has courted controversy after she referred to Algerian boxer Imane Khelif as a man.
summary: Harry Potter creator JK Rowling has courted controversy after she referred to Algerian boxer Imane Khelif as a man.

title: "Shocking, Unfair": Outrage After Algeria Boxer's Olympics Win Over Italian
content: Forty-six seconds into her match against Algeria's Imane Khelif, Italian boxer Angela Carini abandoned the bout. She left the ring in tears, but the result also caused a huge uproar on social media.
summary: Forty-six seconds into her match against Algeria's Imane Khelif, Italian boxer Angela Carini abandoned the bout. She left the ring in tears, but the result also caused a huge uproar on social media.

title: Biden Administration Net Neutrality Rules Blocked By US Court: Report
content: A US appeals court on Thursday blocked the Federal Communications Commission's reinstatement of landmark net neutrality rules, saying broadband providers are likely to succeed in a legal challenge.
summary: A US appeals court on Thursday blocked the Federal Communications Commission's reinstatement of landmark net neutrality rules, saying broadband providers are likely to succeed in a legal challenge.

title: Elon Musk Shares "Men Don't Belong In Women's Sports" Post Amid Gender Row
content: Tesla CEO Elon Musk has backed Italian boxer Angela Carini after her loss to Algerian fighter Imane Khelif at the Paris Olympics 2024 on Thursday.
summary: Tesla CEO Elon Musk has backed Italian boxer Angela Carini after her loss to Algerian fighter Imane Khelif at the Paris Olympics 2024 on Thursday.
